scripts.build:spec:recommend:json: yarn swagger-cli bundle specs/recommend/spec.yml --outfile dist/openapi.json --type json
scripts.build:spec:search:json: yarn swagger-cli bundle specs/search/spec.yml --outfile dist/openapi.json --type json
scripts.build:spec:recommend: yarn swagger-cli bundle specs/recommend/spec.yml --outfile dist/recommend.yml --type yaml
scripts.build:spec:search: yarn swagger-cli bundle specs/search/spec.yml --outfile dist/search.yml --type yaml
scripts.client:build-js: yarn workspace @algolia/recommend build && yarn workspace @algolia/client-search build
scripts.generate:js:recommend: yarn openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key javascript-recommend && CLIENT=recommend yarn utils:import-js
scripts.generate:js:search: yarn openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key javascript-client-search && CLIENT=client-search yarn utils:import-js
scripts.generate:js: yarn generate:js:search && yarn generate:js:recommend && yarn install
